section.name: Release Description
section.p: The Release Description Documents (RDDs) detail the new and modified capabilities that comprise a particular HORIZON System release. These documents will also describe any impact that the new or modified capabilities will have on HORIZON operations, data providers and data consumers.

ul.li:
Version: 5.0.0d
Date: 2014-04-11
Description: This release of HORIZON System includes minor updates to the release 5.0.0d.

Version: 5.0.0c
Date: 2013-12-08
Description: This release of HORIZON System includes minor updates to the release 5.0.0c.

Version: 5.0.0b
Date: 2013-11-05
Description: This release of HORIZON System includes minor updates to the release 5.0.0a.

Vesion: 5.0.0a
Date: 2013-10-01
Description: This release of HORIZON System includes major updates from the release 4.2.1
